title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. The bug report does not provide enough information to fully understand the issue.
OB: When selecting a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: When selecting a binary project, I should be able to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open a binary project in the system (e.g., org.apache.ant). 2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy (e.g., by pressing F4) and observe the message.
